    • FourOfAKind

      int FourOfAKind()
      Description: Check if hand is four of a kind. If it is, return 1 for Four Aces, return 2 for Four 5–K or return 3 for Four 2–4.
      Returns:
      int

    • getHoldStrategy

      List<Integer> getHoldStrategy(boolean print, boolean printKeep)
      Description: Get best strategy for this hand, and check for failure.
      Parameters:
      print - (boolean) - control the terminal output like "player should hold ..."
      printKeep - (boolean) - control the terminal output like "Keep Ace"
      Returns:
      List<Integer> - index of cards player should keep
